text: hananim-ui tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon hananim-eun geuleul nop-eun wichie dueoss-eu lila geuleona geuneun sesang-e nun-eul dol lieo geuui yogmang-eul ttalass-euni geuleul biyuhasa han maliui gaewa gat-eum-i la geudaega geuleul binanhamae geuneun geu ui hyeoleul naemilgo geuleul heunja dueodo geuui hyeoleul naemil-eo boim-ila geugeos eun hananim-ui malsseum-eul geoyeoghaneun jadeulgwa gat-eum-ini geu iyagileul deullyeoju la geulihamyeon geudeul-i suggohalila
